Operation 'get_/uv' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on required vs optional parameters, return value structure, and response schema. Added specificity about parameter types, return object type (uvIndexResult), and authentication status for improved AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Get real-time UV Index by location. Optional altitude, ozone level and datetime could be provided.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve real-time UV Index for a location
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current UV Index value for a specified geographic location. Accepts required latitude and longitude parameters. Optional parameters include altitude (in meters), ozone level (in Dobson Units), and datetime for historical queries. Returns a uvIndexResult object containing the UV Index value, exposure times, and safe exposure recommendations. No authentication required.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on required vs optional parameters, return value structure, and response schema. Added specificity about parameter types, return object type (uvIndexResult), and authentication status for improved AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'get_/forecast' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on required parameters, temporal scope, return value structure, and forecast availability window. Added specificity about parameter requirements, return type (forecastResult array), forecast duration, and authentication status for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Get hourly UV Index Forecast by location and date. Optional altitude, ozone level and datetime could be provided.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve hourly UV Index forecast for a location
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves an hourly UV Index forecast for a specified geographic location and date range. Accepts required latitude and longitude parameters. Optional parameters include altitude (in meters), ozone level (in Dobson Units), and datetime to specify the forecast period. Returns a forecastResult array containing hourly UV Index values and timestamps. Forecasts are typically available for the next 7 days. No authentication required.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on required parameters, temporal scope, return value structure, and forecast availability window. Added specificity about parameter requirements, return type (forecastResult array), forecast duration, and authentication status for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'get_/protection' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_input_details. Missing summary entirely. Description has typo ('altitide'), lacks clarity on required parameters, and doesn't explain what the operation returns or how it calculates protection times. Added summary, corrected terminology, specified required vs optional parameters, clarified the return object type (protectionResult), and explained the accuracy level and default date behavior for improved AI agent usability.

data.current_description: Get daily protection time by location, UV Index from and UV Index to with 10 minutes accuracy. Optional altitide and ozone level could be provided.
data.summary_suggestion: Calculate UV protection time window for a location
data.description_suggestion: Calculates the daily time window during which sun protection is recommended based on specified UV Index thresholds. Accepts required latitude, longitude, and UV Index range parameters (from and to values). Optional parameters include altitude (in meters) and ozone level (in Dobson Units). Returns a protectionResult object containing the start time, end time, and duration of the protection window with 10-minute accuracy. Results are based on the current date unless a specific date is provided. No authentication required.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description has typo ('altitide'), lacks clarity on required parameters, and doesn't explain what the operation returns or how it calculates protection times. Added summary, corrected terminology, specified required vs optional parameters, clarified the return object type (protectionResult), and explained the accuracy level and default date behavior for improved AI agent usability.
